body.p: Incorrect capitialization of selected words found in the topic

section.title: Good Capitalization
section.p: The acronym, JSON stands for "JavaScript Object Notation". Files frequently use the suffix json
The Bluetooth ID attribute is app_id when using XML or Java.

section.title: Bad Capitalization
section.p: The acronym, json stands for "Javascript Object Notation". Files frequently use the suffix json
The bluetooth id is app_id when using xml or JAVA.
